name: feature-selection
description: This script uses Recursive Feature Elimination to filter out the most useful features from a train and a test dataset

inputs.name: rfe-script-id
inputs.description: Recursive Feature Elimination script id. (e.g. script/g5f3jj05eba31d619200g5c0)

inputs.name: pre-selected-fields
inputs.description: list of pre-selected field ids, to bypass RFE execution

outputs.name: filtered-train-dataset
outputs.description: Filtered train dataset with only the selected fields

outputs.name: filtered-validation-dataset
outputs.description: Filtered validation dataset with only the selected fields

outputs.name: filtered-test-dataset
outputs.description: Filtered test dataset with only the selected fields
